ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to eqenchanters@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a new enchanter(lvl5) and I was wondering if its possible to sometimes summon pets that are blue and sometimes black. If so, what are the chances of
ygData.messageBody:
I am a new enchanter(lvl5) and I was wondering if its possible to sometimes
summon pets that are blue and sometimes black. If so, what are the chances
of getting the better pet?

-----Original Message-----
From: eqenchanters-owner@onelist.com <eqenchanters-owner@onelist.com>
To: kutsenok@... <kutsenok@...>
Date: Friday, October 29, 1999 7:25 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Welcome to eqenchanters@onelist.com


>Hello,
>
>Welcome to the list. Please take a moment to review this message.
>
>To unsubscribe from this list, go to the ONElist web site, at
>www.onelist.com, and select the User Center link from the menu bar
>on the left. This menu will also let you change your subscription
>between digest and normal mode.
>
>I'm not sure why you would want to unsubscribe, though, as, since you are
smart
>enough to be an enchanter, you must be smart enough to stay subscribed to
this
>list ;).
>
>Thanks,
>Sloop
>
